about.text: I'm passionate about front-end technologies, I have knowledge in the area of ​​web design, web development and agile methodologies. I have had the opportunity to work in monolithic applications applying technologies such as Codeigniter and Angular under a REST architecture, always oriented to good practices and clean and maintainable code.

desc: Trabajé en el mantenimiento de un sistema de vinculaciones para compra de viviendas de Fiduciaria de Bogotá, en dicho sistema tuve la oportunidad de trabajar con el API de firma eléctronica Docusign, integraciones con web services para validación del historial creditício y Sarlaft. Tambien tuve la oportunidad de trabajar con VueJS en frontend enlazado a un backend creado en NodeJs, todo esto bajo un arquitectura en la nube con GCP

Desarrollé una aplicación web de gestión de solicitudes organizativas para Frontera Energy, en este sistema se utilizaron tecnologias basadas en Javascript, como App Script y el uso de APIs para la manipulación de los servicios de GSuite
I worked on construction a warranty tracking system for travel products, using a multi-tenant architecture with PostgreSQL, Java-based REST APIs and Angular for frontend development.
I worked on the maintenance and bug resolution of a VOIP call management and ticket tracking platform.
I worked on the frontend development of a multimedia management system, using Angular under an architecture based on modules and dynamic components and consuming REST APIs based on C #.
I developed and designed web interfaces from the prototype created in Figma.
I worked in the construction of a monetary credit management system using REST architecture with PHP and consuming each service from a front-end developed in Angular.
I developed a mobile application to consult monetary credits with the Nativescript framework, implementing the communication to a REST API.
I designed static web pages using HTML5, CSS and Bootstrap 4 framework.

education.degree: Technology in Analysis and Development of Information Systems

interests.text-one: I dedicate my time to research on new technologies that appear continuously, especially in the front-end area and can contribute to my professional and personal growth.
interests.text-two: I also enjoy reading mystery and fantasy novels, as well as creating DIY projects for carpentry and construction.
